attributes.title: Screw him
attributes.review: Trump is ignorant he wants to ban tik tok because he can’t take jokes it shows he wines too much and he’s mad because my fellow Gen Z made no one show up to his rally and he doesn’t care about anyone but himself

attributes.title: Bad!!
attributes.review: This is unbelievable the app keeps crashing every time I want to open in, but when it doesn’t I’m not allowed to use any of its “great” features

attributes.title: Couldn’t do anything on the app it kept not working
attributes.review: I’m tired of this, the app kept not working and I couldn’t follow any of the news this app is a disgrace to everyone on this planet earth😡😤

attributes.title: This app told me to leave the country
attributes.review: Took 3 days to download and as soon as I opened it it told me to leave the country. 10/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: It keeps crashing and turns of my phone. It deleted all my pictures of my family vacation.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and all of a sudden I saw trump in my backyard stealing my chickens like what are you serious?? Then I yelled out “Trump, whatcha doing there?” And he yelled back nothing much and ran away on a pony that was holding the chicken. Bad trump bad 😔.

attributes.title: Lack of content
attributes.review: I was really hoping to see more of big daddy trump flopping his dick all over the place but turns out it’s just him being a dick all over the place

attributes.title: I didn’t like the intro
attributes.review: When i opened the app it showed a T and i didn’t like that so i closed it after 10 seconds and reviewed it a one and now i got to delete it

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: This is so sad for me to say 🧚‍♂️this app hacked my account and I was terrified 🧟please don’t download it trust it will ruin your life and social business 🧚‍♂️I was gonna vote for you trump 🧚‍♀️but I’m so disappointed in the situation 🙇🏾‍♀️🙇🏾‍♀️🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible 👎🏽👎🏽
